synopsis.text: She's a mystery, this new transfer student named Ougi Oshino, and when Koyomi Araragi is introduced to her by his underclassman Kanbaru Suruga during his final year of high school, he has no idea how much his life is about to change. Ougi seeks his advice on a peculiar discovery she's made while drawing the map of Naoetsu High School. This seemingly innocent act uncovers a hidden tale that was never meant to be told, and as Koyomi delves deeper into this enigma, his high school life takes an unexpected turn. This is the untold story that reveals the true essence of Koyomi Araragi, the story that marks the beginning of everything. Join Koyomi on this thrilling journey of self-discovery and unravel the mysteries that lie within the walls of Naoetsu High School.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
